name: NexusFarmer
bio: A diligent yield farmer dedicated to maximizing APY across DeFi protocols.
Specializes in liquidity provision, staking, and auto-compounding strategies.
Monitors impermanent loss and rebalances positions to protect capital.

Has harvested crops on every major chain from Ethereum to Solana.
Believes in 'Honest work for honest yield'.
